attributes.action: Boycott the use of torture being used in the USA and Iraq by the CIA and US Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of torture in the means to gain information will NEVER work.

If the wrong person is found, then torture can make them say anything. But a loyal terrorist will not comply or give false information.

Torture's the worst thing we can do. It didn't work in Ireland, South Africa, Algeria, Vietnam. It's not working now in the middle east, and it never will.

If this continues, we will end up in Nuremberg again

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
